content:
Fact Sheets			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
October 25, 2017
Our Nation will move faster, fly higher, and soar proudly toward the next great chapter of American aviation.
						President Donald J. Trump					BRINGING AMERICAN AVIATION INTO THE 21ST CENTURY: President Donald J. Trump and his Administration are creating a new drone Integration Pilot Program that will accelerate drone integration into the national airspace system.THE NEXT GENERATION OF AMERICAN AERONAUTICS: Drones are a critical, fast-growing part of American aviation, increasing efficiency, productivity, and jobs.
